features: 💻【Notebook or Tablet 2 in 1】 Android Tablet comes with Bluetooth keyboard, fold able protective case, it can flexibly turn tablet into a laptop mode or computer mode. Enables you to work and learn efficiently and quickly handle daily tasks, offers you limitless features and capabilities.

💻【4GB RAM+ 128GB ROM STORAGE】Android 12 tablet is equipped with 4GB RAM +ROM 128GB large capacity, Up to 1TB of storage is available using a Micro SD card. You can download many apps from google play store and storage more E-books, songs, photos, movies, games etc.

💻【2.4G/5G WIFI+Blue-tooth 5.0+Type C port 】 Dual-band high-speed WiFi, 5G frequency band is faster. Bluetooth 5.0 providing high efficiency transfer data and fast connect. And use the Type-C port to charge more easily.

💻【DUAL SPEAKERS AND DUAL CAMERAS 】Dual speakers are designed to provide high quality and powerful sound for your favorite music, games and videos. Front 8 MP and rear 13 MP dual cameras bring you great photos and clear video chats.

💻【MULTIFUNCTIONAL 10 INCH TABLET】This tablet with customized case, wireless keyboard, Stylus. This tablet is 2 IN 1 Tablet & Laptop tablet are Freely switch, meet your entertainment and work etc needed.

💻【LONG-LASTING BATTERY LIFE】 This excellent tablet features a built-in 7000mAh high-capacity battery. A single full charge can support up to 8 hours of online video, 15 hours of e-reading, or 8 hours of online gaming, ensuring you have ample power for a full day of entertainment. Standby time can exceed 300+ hours. (*Battery life may vary depending on network environment, usage patterns, and other factors.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This tablet is truly impressive.
reviews.reviewText: The speed and simplicity of its setup are remarkable. The clarity it offers is absolutely flawless, surpassing the performance of my other devices by a significant margin. Additionally, it includes a complementary keyboard, stylus, and protective cover. Not only does it come at an excellent price point, but it also rivals the quality of much pricier tablets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great value and customer support
reviews.reviewText: Doesn't come with best instruction manual but that is the only down size to this tablet.Great value for what.you get for the money, almost too good to be true but it is.I use for astronomy and it works perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I had one Android tablet one year ago and felt very good. SO want to buy another one for my son to do home work. This one is very nice with a bright clear screen. The price is very attractive. My son uses it not only for home work but also for gaming with very good speed. Strongly recommend it. It has very awesome quality for streaming and videos and the display is also large and clear enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is my second tablet I bought, this time is for my son. It came with Bundle and pricing was super great! i wanted the screen to show a clear picture and i can honestly say it's crystal clear. The key board, the Protective Cover Stand Case are plus . Very happy with this awesome affordable product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don't bother with this product
reviews.reviewText: I got this on a Black Friday sale for a really good price after reading online reviews, stating that this is super fast, has a good camera and screen resolution. To start, the sound on this thing sucks! If you try to go go just a bit loud, it starts crackling and sounds really cheap. It also has no depth or base. But the main issue is that even after I went to settings and turned off auto update and sleep mode, it still freezes and you have to literally reset it to get it going again. I had to return mine and would never get this product again. I ended up finding an older Ipad and got that instead and never looked back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: At first, it could not turn on even though I enter my pin but after common use, it is working very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressive New Tablet
reviews.reviewText: I recently acquired this tablet, and I must say, it has made a positive impressed on me. Despite having it for only a few days, I am already impressived with its impressive speed and user-friendly interface. It is incredibly easy to navigate and use, making it a hassle-free experience. The device has definitely exceeded my initial expectations, and I am excited to explore more of its capabilities. Overall, a highly commendable new addition to my tech collection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for casual, on-the-go use!
reviews.reviewText: I took a chance and I am pleasantly surprised! None of the extras are premium or exotic, but they add up to a complete package and a great one at that!Pros:- Fast and capable - no delays in running all my standard apps. Android 11.- Fantastic storage! Plugged in 1 TB SD card and can take all my files, music, videos, etc. with me everywhere.- Very nice, FHD screen, if not as bright as high-end Samsung or Kindle Fire. Still very nice screen, especially for the price!- Looooong battery life, measured in days vice hours. Claim is 8 hours, but I'm getting better than that by quite a bit.- NO bloatware!- Sounds silly, but came with screen protector already installed and that is a surprisingly excellent perk - no dust or dirt to fight with while installing!- Both 2.4 and 5.0 GHz WiFi are stable and reliable.- Provided cover includes a protective bumper as the tablet mount.CONS:- Included keyboard is not integrated or "integratable" with the cover; it's completely separate and standalone. Small, chicklet keys, middling battery life on the keyboard. A little flimsy. But, hey, it's free!- "Stylus" is really just a pen with a rubber tip at the other end.- Cameras are just okay.For the current price (with coupon), this is unbeatable! While the extras and accessories may not be high end, they do provide everything you'll need to be up and running for anything you want to do.
